description: Integration tests for the scientific content generation agent

eval_cases.description: Test basic content generation with a simple AI topic

parts.text:
Generate scientific content on the following topic: Machine Learning Interpretability

Preferences:
- Target platforms: blog, linkedin, twitter
- Tone: professional
- Target audience: researchers and professionals

Generate content for all three platforms: blog article, LinkedIn post, and Twitter thread.

=== FINAL BLOG ARTICLE ===
[Content should include title, introduction, main sections, conclusion, and references]

=== FINAL LINKEDIN POST ===
[Content should include hook, key insights, and hashtags]

=== FINAL TWITTER THREAD ===
[Content should include numbered tweets under 280 chars]

=== CITATIONS ===
[Formatted citations from academic sources]

eval_cases.description: Test content generation with specific audience targeting

parts.text:
Generate scientific content on the following topic: Quantum Computing Applications

Preferences:
- Target platforms: blog, linkedin
- Tone: accessible
- Target audience: industry professionals without deep technical background

Focus on practical applications rather than theoretical foundations.
Content should be accessible to non-experts, focus on real-world applications, and include relevant citations from industry sources.
